caption.title: Simulated water level timeline visualizing model- and climate-related uncertainly.
caption.p: Green and orange solid lines represent the full outlet capacity and business-as-usual (BAU) simulations under the CMIP-5 RCP6.0 2020s climate. Black solid line represents the BAU simulations under the CMIP-3 A2 2020s climate, which is roughly equivalent to CMIP-5 RCP6.0. The two standard deviation wide shadow areas encompassing the solid lines represent visualized propagation of uncertainly related to differences in GCM output.
